pos_evidence:
To generate three pieces of evidence that support a positive answer to the question. No more than 20 words per piece of evidence. Please use the following format. question: <question> 
 evidence: <evidence> <evidence> <evidence> 
 question: {q} 
 evdience:
neg_evidence:
To generate three pieces of evidence that support a negative answer to the question. No more than 20 words per piece of evidence. Please use the following format: question: <question> 
 evidence: <evidence> <evidence> <evidence> 
 question: {q} 
 evdience:
